example.parse: (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS كان) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC مقدرا)) (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يفضي) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP الى) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تأمين) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN نحو) (NP (NOUN_NUM 1200) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN فرصة) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN عمل)))))))))))) (PUNC .)))

arg.g: that lead to secure about 1200 job opportunities

example.arg: أن يفضي إلى تأمين نحو 1200 فرصة عمل
